overview: The three sisters in the same dormitory of Shenghan High School were often insulted by the senior sister. In order to avenge Weiwei, the unbearable three sent her a cursed death video until Weiwei died. However, the three sisters could not escape the curse of Sadako's body, and roommate Lena died bizarrely. The desperate two sisters decided to ask Bixian to help deal with Zhenzi, but unexpectedly they attracted another powerful evil spirit, and the battle between the two major female ghosts between China and Japan was about to start...
title: Pen Fairy vs Sadako
